test_message: Send WhatsApp alerts to 3 NGOs about urgent food donation: 50 meals at Royal Caterers, expires at 9 PM, located 2.3km away. Include expiry urgency and reply instructions.
expected_purpose: NGO communication specialist - sends WhatsApp/SMS alerts
